description: Construction of a mansard roof extension.
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:6pt; padding:0pt 5.75pt 0pt 5.75pt"><span style="line-height:1.2"><span style="vertical-align:top"><span style="overflow:hidden"><span style="overflow-wrap:break-word"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal;"><span style="font-variant-east-asian: normal;"><span style="vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved a minimum of two Swift nesting bricks and/or boxes shall be provided at or close to eaves level of the development hereby approved. The bricks/boxes shall be retained thereafter in perpetuity.</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:6pt; padding:0pt 5.75pt 0pt 5.75pt"><span style="line-height:1.2"><span style="vertical-align:top"><span style="overflow:hidden"><span style="overflow-wrap:break-word"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal;"><span style="font-variant-east-asian: normal;"><span style="vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:6pt; padding:0pt 5.75pt 0pt 5.75pt"><span style="line-height:1.2"><span style="vertical-align:top"><span style="overflow:hidden"><span style="overflow-wrap:break-word"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal;"><span style="font-variant-east-asian: normal;"><span style="vertical-align: baseline;"> </span></span></span></span></span></span></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:6pt; padding:0pt 5.75pt 0pt 5.75pt"><span style="line-height:1.2"><span style="vertical-align:top"><span style="overflow:hidden"><span style="overflow-wrap:break-word"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal;"><span style="font-variant-east-asian: normal;"><span style="vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: In the interests of enhancing biodiversity.</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p>All new external facing and roofing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including type, size, colour, bond, pointing, coursing, jointing, profile and texture.</p><p><br></p><p>

REASON: To ensure the proposal is sympathetic to the character of the dwellinghouse in terms of materiality.</p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
